which client version are you using?
can you please have a look at the logfiles on server and client? thx

i did the following to try and reproduce this for testing:
  1. move secure.crypt out of my owncloud folder and wait until that propagated
  1. kill the client on the originating computer
  1. start the client with --logfile owncloud.log
  1. copy secure.crypt into my owncloud folder
  1. wait for owncloud to finish propagating
  1. check file size on server and second client
the file sizes matched this time. i tried again without --logfile and it still works. so i can't reproduce this right now. if i do see it again, what things should i look for to aide in debugging?
